text: Kjell Arnljot Wig (31 December 1924 – 18 January 2015) was a Norwegian media personality. He was born in Stjørdal and died in Bærum. He was a journalist for Morgenbladet from 1948, and was assigned with the Norwegian Broadcasting Corporation from 1963 to 1992. He hosted a series of television shows, including Aktuell debatt, Vindu mot verden and Åpen post. Among his books are Det skjulte Norge from 1969, Kongen ser tilbake from 1977, and Eventyret om Blaafarveværket from 1995. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2015 deaths Category:People from Stjørdal Category:Personnel of the legal purge in Norway Category:Norwegian journalists Category:Norwegian television presenters Category:NRK people
